Reference

R Markdown Rendering Engines

Create Mayo-Themed documents from R Markdown

mayohtml()

A mayo themed html format

mayodocx()

A mayo themed docx format

mayomoon_reader()

A mayo themed template for remark.js slides

Open R Markdown Templates

Open a Mayo-Themed R Markdown template

use_mayodocx() use_mayohtml() use_mayomoon_reader()

Create and open a Mayo themed Rmd file
